name: Schema Ninja
author: Jitendra Vaswani

sections.description:
What is a Rich Snippet?
Rich Snippets is the term used to describe structured data markup that site operators can add to their existing HTML, which in turn allow search engines to better understand what information is contained on each web page. See example on our blog : Usage of SchemaNinja
How does a Rich Snippet help?
It gives search engines only the important & precise information to display in search result snippets.

Rich Snippets are very interactive (photos, star ratings, price, author, etc.) to let you stand out from competition on SERP�s. There are high chances that users will click more on Schema results than non schema results.
Supported Content Types –
This plugin suppojitendra.coowing types of Schemas: * Review * Product * Software Application * Video * Articles
Future release would include –
More pro recommendations features in SchemaNinja new version.

We Follow Google Standards
This plugin is modeled and will be updated according to Google guidelines that you will find here: https://developers.google.com/structured-data/

You can validate structured data on any web page here: https://developers.google.com/structured-data/testing-tool/
For more information about the plugin author visit:

Jitendra Vaswani
Twitter

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload Schemaninja.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Now you can use SchemaNinja
sections.faq:
• Why this plugin need a key to activate ?

Ans- To use this plugin you need to get a key from respective webiste.This is because of preventing this plugin from spammers and code copiers.This is not hard process you need to submit your email or get your free key.You will not charge for anything in this plugin version

short_description: SchemaNinja Rich Snippets & Recommendation plugin.  SchemaNinja can Boost CTR, Improve SEO & Rankings. Supports most of the content type.
